sentences.en: ...an open meeting, where members socialized and welcomed any new members.
sentences.cn: …让会员们相互交流、欢迎所有新成员的一次公开集会。

sentences.en: "Do you think it's a good idea to socialize with one'spatients?" — "Actually, I do, I think it's a great idea."
sentences.cn: “你认为和自己的病人交朋友的想法好吗？”——“说实在的，我认为很好，这个想法很棒。”

sentences.en: Care-givers get a chance to socialize with men and women who are in the same position as themselves.
sentences.cn: 护理员有机会和从事同样工作的人交往。

sentences.en: He thinks he can socialize with us. As if!
sentences.cn: 他自认为他可以跟我们交往! 才怪!

sentences.en: He went to socialize with the guests.
I love to socialize with the Olympic heroes from Atlanta.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢与亚特兰大奥运英雄们来往.

sentences.en: I never allow my dogs to socialize with strange dogs.
sentences.cn: 我从来不允许我的狗与其它狗有交往.

sentences.en: It was rude of you not to socialize with the people at the party.
sentences.cn: 在晚会上不和别人交谈是很粗鲁的.

sentences.en: It's the safest, most comfortable environment to relax and socialize in.
sentences.cn: 它是最安全 、 最舒适的放松和交际的环境.

sentences.en: Let the students themselves decide with whom they want to socialize.
sentences.cn: 让学生们自己决定他们愿跟什么人交往.

sentences.en: She's got lots of friends, she likes to socialize.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢与人交往, 所以有许多朋友.

sentences.en: Shrewd bargainers, Toydarians liked to socialize and strike deals.
sentences.cn: 作为精明的商人, 托伊达里亚人善于交际和做生意.

sentences.en: The old man hates to socialize.
They are content to socialize with small circle of people.
sentences.cn: 他们满足于只和一小群人来往.

sentences.en: Well, you joined anyway, to socialize with the neighbors.
sentences.cn: 嗯, 你加入无论如何, 社交与邻居.

sentences.en: You be wise to socialize with as many people as possible.
sentences.cn: 与尽可能多的人交往才是明智的选择.

words.tran_cn: 社交的；好交际的；友善的
社会的（等于sociologic）；社会学的；针对社会问题的
在社会上；在社交方面；善于交际地
社会主义者；社会党党员
使社会化（socialize的过去分词）；社交
参加社交活动；发生社交往来（等于socialize）
使社会化；使社会主义化

trans.tran_en: to spend time with other people in a friendly way

trans.tran_cn: 使社会化，使适合于过社会生活，使参加集体学习
